name: Devolution (Serinox)
description:
This is a prototype!

The aim of the game is to fight off waves of enemies by harvesting their spores and crafting different potions.
The potions have different effects which modify your attacks and have various other effects.

Looking for general feedback on the idea.
Ideas for potions
Ideas for enemy types
Feedback on combat
Ideas for improving the potion crafting/drinking system
